link.title: HOME
link.script:

");}).call(this);

p.strong: Per Governor Murphy's recent announcement, in order to prevent the spread of COVID-19, school closures will be extended until at least Friday, May 15. Remote instruction and remote learning will resume on Monday, April 20 and will continue for the next four weeks, Monday through Friday.
The Delanco Staff misses you. Click on the link below to view Slideshow.

p.a: How to reapply for Lunch Benefits
Internet Access for Families in Need
Sign your child up for 2019 - 2020 ExCare!
